hero.title: Masaq Al-Amaar
hero.subtitle: Construction & Architecture
hero.description: Professional construction and architecture company specializing in integrated design and implementation of residential and commercial projects with the highest standards of quality and excellence in Jeddah and Saudi Arabia

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A Story of Excellence and Innovation
about.story: Masaq Al-Amaar is a leading company in construction and architecture, founded with a clear vision to provide integrated solutions in design and implementation for residential and commercial projects. We believe that every project is a unique story that deserves exceptional attention and care.
about.methodology: We follow a precise scientific methodology in all work phases, from initial consultation to final delivery, focusing on quality and commitment to specified timelines.
about.commitment: Our commitment to quality and excellence is not just a slogan, but a way of life we apply in every detail of our work, from selecting the best materials to employing the most skilled craftsmen and engineers.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Solutions for All Your Construction Needs
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of specialized services in construction and architecture

architectural.title: Architectural & Interior Design
architectural.description: Innovative architectural design that combines beauty and functionality, with interior design that reflects your refined taste and meets your practical needs

structural.title: Structural Construction Work
structural.description: Implementation of structural work with the highest standards of quality and safety, from foundations to reinforced concrete structure

finishing.title: Finishing Work
finishing.description: Interior and exterior finishes with the finest materials and modern techniques, adding the distinctive final touch to your project

turnkey.title: Turnkey Projects
turnkey.description: Comprehensive project management from start to finish, where we handle all work phases to deliver a ready-to-use project

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your construction and architecture needs. Our team is ready to bring your vision to life.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: Studied Steps to Ensure Your Project's Success
process.description: We follow a studied scientific methodology in project implementation to ensure the best results

consultation.title: Consultation & Requirements Understanding
consultation.description: We start with a detailed meeting to understand your vision, requirements, and budget, providing appropriate professional consultation

survey.title: Site Survey & Measurements
survey.description: We visit the site and conduct precise field surveys, taking all necessary measurements for design

design.title: Design Preparation & Approval
design.description: We prepare architectural and structural designs and present them to you for review and approval before starting implementation

implementation.title: Implementation & Monitoring
implementation.description: We begin project implementation according to approved designs with continuous monitoring and regular progress reports

delivery.title: Final Delivery
delivery.description: We deliver the project complete and ready for use with quality guarantee and after-delivery service

gallery.title: Our Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: Distinguished Projects Reflecting Our Expertise and Creativity
gallery.description: Explore a collection of our finest completed projects
gallery.navigationHint: Swipe or use arrow keys to navigate

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're Here to Serve You
contact.description: Contact us today to discuss your next project
contact.whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to inquire about your construction and architecture services
